title: "Global Industrial Robotics Market to Surpass US$ 69.1 Mn by end of 2027, Says Coherent Market Insights"
excerpt: "According to Coherent Market Insights, The global industrial robotics market was valued at US$ 49.0 Mn in 2019 and is forecast to reach a value of US$ 69.1 Mn by 2027 at a CAGR of 6.4% between 2020 and 2027."
